name: Rainbow Space (made by Morgan and Sarofer Zertaga)
name_original: Rainbow Space (made by Morgan and Sarofer Zertaga)
description:
Rainbow Space! A game about making love to planets!

Made at Trashy Game Jam 2016.

Game made by Morgan and Sarofer Zertaga.

Visuals by Morgan.

Music by Sarofer Zertaga.

Use your computers "cursor movement keys" to move the heart spaceship.

Development time approximately 4 hours.
